name: Left tap Right tap
description:
Control both games on the left and right side of the screen.
You have to play with both hands at the same time.
Stay alive within the allotted time and then you will move on to the next level, and your brain quotient might go up too.

Game Features:
• Play with both of your hands, let you left and right brains think at the same time, and work our your brain.
• Exercise the hand-eye coordination of your left and right brains.
• Combination of lots of classic games, such as snake, fall down, ping pong, plane shooting, etc.
• Fresh gaming experience that provides both challenge and joy.
• Besides, it is such an interesting game to play with friends.
